attributes.action: Do not cancel local elections in May 2025
attributes.additional_details: It is not democratic but the opposite of what people who live , vote and die in a democracy want.
attributes.background: Review and do not cancel the local elections in May 2025 that is set to stop over 5 million people being able to vote.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
